body: A Canal is an artificial waterway that allows barge traffic to haul heavy commodities.
name: Canal*
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Terrain Improvements/Canal*

sections.body: Settlements in a hex with a Canal treat the hex as if it had a river.
sections.name: Effect

sections.body: Twice the cost of a Road (see the Terrain and Terrain Improvements table).
sections.name: Cost
